topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5512d81b636872390fea2400#post_5512d81b636872390fea2400
[bq="Number1pegasus"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5512d4d1636872395d000500#post_5512d4d1636872395d000500
WHEN WILL WE SEE ALIENS!

[/bq]
Not to get everyone's hopes excited, *BUT* theoretically some time in the next twenty years.

One of the biggest problems with our current SETI program is that it's just impossible to measure *EVERY* frequency 24/7/365 from all of the universe at all times.  We could just one day and get lucky and find something, but it's just resource impossible currently to do so.

It's why I'm so excited for how technology if your ability to monitor frequencies is exponentially increasing then that exponentially increases your ability to find aliens.

Will we ever be able to talk to them?  No; chances are if we find something they'll be so far away that we won't ever be able to talk to them or communicate with them in any form and that they'll never know we exist.
